channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Investors Protest Deforestation As The Amazon Tipping Point Approaches
item.description: Investors managing $3 trillion worth of assets have signed the Belem Investor Statement on Rainforests to support an end to deforestation by 2030 in a...

item.title: The WhatsApp $1 Million Hack Mystery — What You Need To Know
item.description: Has WhatsApp been hacked with a $1 million zero-click zero-day exploit? Here’s everything we know so far.

item.title: Epomaker’s RT85 Mechanical Keyboard Has A Massive Battery And A Programmable Display
item.description: This affordable mechanical keyboard from Epomaker includes a novel LCD and a joystick, giving the RT85 a retro vibe, although there's nothing retro ab...

item.title: ‘Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake’ Gets A Lovely Launch Trailer
item.description: With the launch of 'Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake' looming, we’ve been graced with a lovely new launch trailer for the game.

item.title: Is Nintendo’s London Pop-Up Store Worth A Visit?
item.description: Before it opened on Wednesday, I visited Nintendo’s first European store which is based in west London. Unsurprisingly, I spent far too much money.

item.title: On making it worse
item.description: If someone with less skill and less dedication than you took over your job, could they degrade the quality of your work? It’s not difficult to make a ...

item.title: The future
item.description: If there was a website you could visit to find out what the future held, how often would you visit it? We do that with the weather, sometimes daily. P...

item.title: Outcomes and tasks
item.description: It’s difficult to spend the entire day working on outcomes. Sooner or later, there are tasks to be done, tasks we believe will get us to the outcome w...

item.title: The writer’s room
item.description: It’s quite likely that your favorite TV show wasn’t written by a single person. There’s a room filled with professionals, bouncing ideas back and fort...

item.title: Foggy mirror
item.description: It’s easy to believe we have an accurate understanding of ourselves. After all, we spend a lot of time looking in the mirror. It might be worth wonder...
